postGameAnalysis.wasNormalVariance: This was NOT normal variance. Wizards' 2nd win in 17 games came against Hawks as double-digit favorites. Bad teams occasionally play their best game - this was one of those nights.

closingLineValue.verdict: Slight negative CLV - line moved slightly against us. Market may have sensed trap game.

keyTakeaways: In-Season Tournament motivates bad teams - be cautious with large spreads
Wizards' 2nd win in 17 games was against us - awful timing
Large road spreads against NBA teams are always risky
Even worst teams in league can catch fire from three
Hawks defense no-showed when it mattered most
verdict: Bad beat but also a lesson - large road spreads in In-Season Tournament are trap games. Should have been more cautious with 2u stake on -10.5 road spread.
